title: EntityServerCommands
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityServerCommandslink

Commands that update the remote server.

interface EntityServerCommands<T> { add(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions & { isOptimistic?: false; }): Observable<T> cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void delete(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string> getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> loadWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]> update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T> }

Child interfaceslink

  • EntityCommands
    • EntityDispatcher
    • EntityCollectionService

Methodslink

add() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
add(entity: T, options: EntityActionOptions & { isOptimistic: true; }): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity T
options EntityActionOptions & { isOptimistic: true; }

Returns

Observable<T>
add(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity T
options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>

cancel() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save) with the given correlationId.
cancel(correlationId: any, reason?: string, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

correlationId any

The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction
reason string

explains why canceled and by whom.

Optional. Default is undefined.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as the tag

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

delete() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
delete(key: string | number, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<number | string>

Parameters

key string | number

The primary key of the entity to remove
options EntityActionOptions

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<number | string>: Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

getAll() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
getAll(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options EntityActionOptions

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

getByKey() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
getByKey(key: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

key any

The primary key of the entity to get.
options EntityActionOptions

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the queried entities that are in the collection after server reports success or the query error.

getWithQuery() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
getWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

queryParams string | QueryParams

the query in a form understood by the server
options EntityActionOptions

options that influence merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

load() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
load(options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

options EntityActionOptions

options that influence load behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the entities in the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

loadWithQuery() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
loadWithQuery(queryParams: string | QueryParams, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T[]>

Parameters

queryParams string | QueryParams

the query in a form understood by the server
options EntityActionOptions

options that influence load behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T[]>: A terminating Observable of the entities in the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

update() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
update(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity Partial<T>

update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.
options EntityActionOptions

options that influence save and merge behavior

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

upsert() link

mode_edit code

Dispatch action to save a new or update an existing entity to remote storage. Only dispatch this action if your server supports upsert.
upsert(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): Observable<T>

Parameters

entity T

entity to upsert, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

Observable<T>: A terminating Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
